body_html:
Actually I'm not sure this is the cause, the imm_data is the same one sent from the PS and received by worker0 (986591585). Nothing would have worked if this was the case.

Maybe the NameHash function acts different between the 2 nodes ?
in PS this hash is for "rx_message_buffer" (RdmaMessageBuffer::SendNextItem) but somehow it worker0 the FindBuffer acts differently ?

body:
Actually I'm not sure this is the cause, the imm_data is the same one sent from the PS and received by worker0 (986591585). Nothing would have worked if this was the case.

Maybe the NameHash function acts different between the 2 nodes ? 
in PS this hash is for "rx_message_buffer" (RdmaMessageBuffer::SendNextItem) but somehow it worker0 the FindBuffer acts differently ?
